> > I was playing Telvido's scenario #390 with an super-charged cleric 
the only character types I could bring back as either skeletons or
ghosts were the faeries placed in the scenario - not the slimes. 

> Where you playing Gladiator or Openglad?

Gladiator.

I haven't put Open-Glad on my pc since I installed a new hd.

I keep getting pretty close beating to scenario 390 without modifying
it.  I can tell you that certain characters don't have a chance in
that scenario.
